description: Chuff it is where things land when they fall out of my head. I'm Pete Lambert; a husband, father, web UI engineer and keen cyclist from Yorkshire.
shortbio: Brought up in Bradford and now living in York with my amazing wife and son. I cycle on road, gravel and mountain. I'm a Senior UI Engineer at Logikcull. I'd love to be a Viking but I can't grow a beard - That's all that's stopping me, I'm sure.
